item.description: Column-Oriented Storage Basic idea: Although fact tables are often over 100 columns wide, a typical data warehouse query only accesses 4 or 5 of them at one time (SELECT *​ queries are rarely needed for analytics) The idea behind column-oriented storage is simple: don’t store all the values from one row together, but store all the values from each column together instead. If each column
